snippet.title: Puzzle Fighter Promo
snippet.description:
Experience the evolution of the beloved arcade classic Puzzle Fighter!

Assemble a team of legendary characters from favorite Capcom franchises. Challenge players to thrilling real-time battles. Discover dozens of strategic abilities. Build up and destroy gems to unleash epic combos. Puzzle Fight your way to the top of the World Leaderboard!
